data.approach: Fix TasksPaused.svelte to pass showStatus={false} to TaskIdBadge to remove spinning gear icon. The component was incorrectly using showState prop (which does not exist) instead of showStatus.

summary: Fixed TasksPaused.svelte to pass showStatus={false} instead of non-existent showState prop
This removes the spinning gear icon from paused session task badges
Paused sessions now display task IDs with the same clean style as active tasks
reviewFocus: Verify the prop name change is correct - showStatus is the valid prop, not showState
